Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.SawHitPoint Class Reference

This class represents a hit point for a saw tool in a virtual reality environment. More...

void Update ()
 This method is called once per frame and handles the interaction logic for the saw. It checks for user input to perform actions such as cutting and indicating.

Detailed Description

This class represents a hit point for a saw tool in a virtual reality environment.
